title.narrative: South Sudan: Women and Girls for Change (WG4C)

description.narrative:
Direct beneficiaries: - Women leaders - Youth leaders - Community leaders and local authorities - Members of traditional courts - Members of Peace Committees - Other community actors
Indirect beneficiaries: - Members of community dialogues - Members of community Forum
NAP 1325 activities linked to Peace from Below programming

Result area 1: Women and girls are more resilient and better protected Medium Term objectives/ outcomes: Women and girls are less vulnerable to physical and emotional harm; Woman and girls have access and use psychosocial and legal protection services
Result area 2: An enabling environment exists for the promotion of gender equality Medium Term objectives/ outcomes: Attitudes and beliefs on SGBV and gender discrimination have changed Men and boys advance gender equality Women and girls are empowered and claim their rights
Result area 3: Women and girls are meaningfully engaged in local decision making related to conflict prevention and resolution, peacebuilding, relief and recovery peace and security Medium Term objectives/ outcomes: Women and young women have access to decision making fora Local actors are supportive of women participation in conflict prevention and peacebuilding Women show leadership in peacebuilding

The project supports the creation of an empowering and inclusive environment, where women and girls feel safe and are enabled to realize their rights and opportunities, to play a significant role towards sustainable peace.

mailing-address.narrative: P.O. Box 19318 3501 DH Utrecht The Netherlands

sector.narrative: Ending violence against women and girls
